title: Best of The Herd for Apr 30, 2020

description:
Aaron Rodgers should help teach Jordan Love so he can get out of Green Bay sooner

This is make or break year for Baker Mayfield

Michael Jordan's dynasty did get some breaks that helped elevate them even higher

NFC over/under win totals


Guest: Chris Simms, NBC Sports & former NFL QB
